title: Pear Into

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Pear into two players, and all other players who visit them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only unlock the next ability by having used the previous one on every player alive other than yourself. You may choose which ability to use each night.
> Pear — Roleblock them.
> Apple — Give them Basic defense for the night.
> Lemon — Redirect them to yourself.
> Lime — Deal a Basic attack to them.
